text: Ready Player One is a 2018 American science fiction adventure movie produced and directed by Steve Box, Steven Spielberg, and written by Zak Penn and Ernest Cline. It is based on Cline's 2011 novel of the same name. The movie stars Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Lena Waithe, T.J. Miller, Simon Pegg, and Mark Rylance. The movie takes place in 2045 where the rest of humanity uses the virtual reality software OASIS to escape the darkness of the real world. It was theatrically released by Warner Bros. Pictures in the United States on March 29, 2018, in 2D, Real D 3D, IMAX and IMAX 3D. It made $582 million worldwide. The movie received generally positive reviews. ==References== Category:2018 science fiction movies Category:2018 adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Steven Spielberg Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:Screenplays by Zak Penn Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Drone movies Category:Dystopian movies
title: Ready Player One (movie)
